// query-dsl/multi-match-query.asciidoc:228

[source, php]
----
$params = [
    'body' => [
        'query' => [
            'bool' => [
                'should' => [
                    [
                        'match' => [
                            'title' => 'quick brown fox',
                        ],
                    ],
                    [
                        'match' => [
                            'title.original' => 'quick brown fox',
                        ],
                    ],
                    [
                        'match' => [
                            'title.shingles' => 'quick brown fox',
                        ],
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ],
];
$response = $client->search($params);
----
